title: 2016 Preseason Champion Mana changes

embed.description: UPDATE: A few mysterious lines were added to the announcer VO!] The PBE has been updated! As we enter into the second patch of preseason, the RIFT HERALD is now available for testing, we have a few new summoner icons, several adjustments for masteries and item & ability icons, another large set of balance changes, and more!

body:
Alistar:
Base Mana Regen Per Second increased to 1.7 from 1.2

Anivia:
Base Mana increased to 396.04 from 346.04
Mana Growth reduced to 50 from 53

Base Mana Regen Per Second increased to 1.7 from 1.2

But... Where is {{champion:27}}  {{champion:27}}  {{champion:27}}  {{champion:27}} ???? He is like the only Mana hungry champ to not get a Mana increase. Why???  {{champion:27}} {{item:3070}} {{champion:27}} {{item:3070}} {{champion:27}} {{item:3070}} {{champion:27}} {{item:3070}}
